name: CTRunStatus
desc: A bitfield that represents the disposition of the run.

items.name: static var rightToLeft: CTRunStatus
items.desc: The run proceeds from right to left.

items.name: static var nonMonotonic: CTRunStatus
items.desc: The run isn't in strictly increasing or decreasing order.

items.name: static var hasNonIdentityMatrix: CTRunStatus
items.desc: The run requires a specific text matrix to be set in the current Core Graphics context for proper drawing.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt32)
items.desc: Creates a run status structure with the specified raw value.
